name: SupportCyclopsBoyAndDoggo
_source: speak;CyclopsBoy;Is shiny rock!|Pretty, yes?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} like collecting shiny things.
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} wonder...|Do dogs like shiny things too?
speak;CyclopsBoy;Here!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} share with friend!|You can have this one.
speak;CyclopsBoy;Oh!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} see something!|What that stick for?
speak;CyclopsBoy;Is for throwing?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} can throw far!|Watch!
speak;CyclopsBoy;Oh!|You chase stick?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} understand game now!
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} throw, you fetch!|Fun game!|We play together!
speak;CyclopsBoy;Haha!|{v:DoggoName} fast!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} like playing with you!|Better than humans who run away from {v:CyclopsBoyName}.
speak;CyclopsBoy;We be friends, yes?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} not have many friends.
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} love music!|Make heart feel big!
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:DoggoName} bring {v:CyclopsBoyName} here to show dancing animals?|Thank you!|This best thing {v:CyclopsBoyName} see all day!
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} not good at reading.|Not good at magic.|Not good at talking.|But {v:CyclopsBoyName} good at dancing!
speak;CyclopsBoy;You dance too, {v:DoggoName}?|You spin! Good dancing!
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} happy have friend like you.|You not laugh at {v:CyclopsBoyName}.|You show {v:CyclopsBoyName} nice things.
speak;CyclopsBoy;We come back here again?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} want learn more dancing!
speak;CyclopsBoy;There you are!|Bad humans say mean things to {v:CyclopsBoyName} today.
speak;CyclopsBoy;They say {v:CyclopsBoyName} too dumb for magic.|Say {v:CyclopsBoyName} hands too big for bow.
speak;CyclopsBoy;*sadly*|Maybe they right?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} just big monster.
speak;CyclopsBoy;Big bow!|Fit {v:CyclopsBoyName}'s hands!|You think {v:CyclopsBoyName} can learn?
speak;CyclopsBoy;Hya!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} did it!|Not perfect, but {v:CyclopsBoyName} can learn!
speak;CyclopsBoy;*Sniff*|{v:DoggoName} best friend.|You believe in {v:CyclopsBoyName} when others laugh.
speak;CyclopsBoy;{v:CyclopsBoyName} protect {v:DoggoName} always!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} crush anyone who hurt you!
speak;CyclopsBoy;After war, {v:CyclopsBoyName} and {v:DoggoName} stay friends?|Maybe start music school?|{v:CyclopsBoyName} teach dancing, {v:DoggoName} teach... barking?
speak;CyclopsBoy;Ha ha ha!|{v:CyclopsBoyName} and {v:DoggoName}!|Best music teachers ever!
